name: skel_arc_empire_01
text: When I look out my window, I see a kingdom of bone.
text_simple: when i look out my window i see a kingdom of bone

name: skel_arc_empire_02
text: When I don't see a kingdom of bone, I see a land begging to be a part of it.
text_simple: when i dont see a kingdom of bone i see a land begging to be a part of it

name: skel_arc_empire_03
text: One kingdom after another falls as I build my great empire.
text_simple: one kingdom after another falls as i build my great empire

name: skel_arc_empire_04
text: And when there are no more worlds to conquer... Will I weep?
text_simple: and when there are no more worlds to conquer will i weep

name: skel_arc_empire_05
text: Do I look like the sentimental type?
text_simple: do i look like the sentimental type

name: skel_arc_empire_06
text: By that point the first additions will need a good reminder anyway.
text_simple: by that point the first additions will need a good reminder anyway

name: skel_arc_hopeless_01
text: If you chop off my arm, I'm just going to stick it back on there.
text_simple: if you chop off my arm im just going to stick it back on there

name: skel_arc_hopeless_02
text: If you sever my head, eventually my body will find its way home.
text_simple: if you sever my head eventually my body will find its way home

name: skel_arc_hopeless_03
text: Hold no hope to defeat me. I am immortal royalty and you are lower than a peasant.
text_simple: hold no hope to defeat me i am immortal royalty and you are lower than a peasant

name: skel_arc_mem_01
text: I have no need for memories of flesh.
text_simple: i have no need for memories of flesh

name: skel_arc_mem_03
text: But I will not end. My reign will not end.
text_simple: but i will not end my reign will not end

name: skel_arc_mem_04
text: Those who understand that fact can find a place in my empire.
text_simple: those who understand that fact can find a place in my empire

name: skel_arc_mem_05
text: Those who oppose it... Well, I'll find a place for them in my empire, too. As crafted BONE.
text_simple: those who oppose it well ill find a place for them in my empire too as crafted bone

name: skel_arc_spawn_03
text: King am I of all that is flesh and bone.
text_simple: king am i of all that is flesh and bone

name: skel_arc_spawn_04
text: Do not question my purpose -- just follow my commands.
text_simple: do not question my purpose just follow my commands

name: skel_arc_spawn_07
text: They could all surrender now, but something tells me they aren't smart enough.
text_simple: they could all surrender now but something tells me they arent smart enough

name: skel_arc_spawn_08
text: Worry not, peasants. This war can finally begin.
text_simple: worry not peasants this war can finally begin

name: skel_arc_spawn_09
text: Let's get this over with quickly. I've got nations to kill.
text_simple: lets get this over with quickly ive got nations to kill

name: skel_arc_spawn_10
text: Run from it if you will. But none can stop the legion of bone.
text_simple: run from it if you will but none can stop the legion of bone

name: skel_arc_spawn_11
text: At this point you really should just address me as Emperor.
text_simple: at this point you really should just address me as emperor
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_spawn_12
text: In a pathetic way, I sometimes envy those who get to wake each day in my kingdom... free of the worries concerning its expansion.
text_simple: in a pathetic way i sometimes envy those who get to wake each day in my kingdom free of the worries concerning its expansion

name: skel_arc_spawn_13
text: There's something different today. But I can't put my finger on it...
text_simple: theres something different today but i cant put my finger on it

name: skel_arc_spawn_14
text: Where I tread, a kingdom of bone follows.
text_simple: where i tread a kingdom of bone follows

name: skel_arc_spawn_15
text: Count yourselves fortunate, mortals and other base creatures, you finally have a chance to be part of something that will last forever.
text_simple: count yourselves fortunate mortals and other base creatures you finally have a chance to be part of something that will last forever

name: skel_arc_spawn_16
text: There's nothing unhealthy about my obsession. Here, let me show you.
text_simple: theres nothing unhealthy about my obsession here let me show you

name: skel_arc_spawn_17
text: I have a very good feeling about today. Call it kingly intuition.
text_simple: i have a very good feeling about today call it kingly intuition

name: skel_arc_intro_02
text: Kneel before your king... and I might spare your head!
text_simple: kneel before your king and i might spare your head
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_intro_03
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_intro_05
text: Submit to the empire of bone!
text_simple: submit to the empire of bone
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_intro_06
text: People keep asking if I'm back. Yeah. I'm thinkin' I'm back!
text_simple: people keep asking if im back yeah im thinkin im back

name: skel_arc_intro_07
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_intro_08
text: Swear you fealty to the empire of bone?
text_simple: swear you fealty to the empire of bone

name: skel_arc_intro_09
text: Wherever I lay my throne is home.
text_simple: wherever i lay my throne is home

name: skel_arc_intro_10
text: I swing the executioner's blade myself.
text_simple: i swing the executioners blade myself

name: skel_arc_intro_11
text: Bow before me. Or prepare to meet your fate.
text_simple: bow before me or prepare to meet your fate
criteria: Spawn Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_intro_12
text: I do not suffer fools in my court. I prefer to make THEM suffer.
text_simple: i do not suffer fools in my court i prefer to make them suffer

name: skel_arc_intro_14
text: Surprised to see me? Yeah, I get that a lot.
text_simple: surprised to see me yeah i get that a lot

name: skel_arc_graves_empty_04
text: I just thought of the perfect place to kill a few rivals in no time. No questions asked!
text_simple: i just thought of the perfect place to kill a few rivals in no time no questions asked

name: skel_arc_graveyard_02
text: The graves of nations build a glorious empire.
text_simple: the graves of nations build a glorious empire

name: skel_arc_graveyard_03
text: I've laid waste to nations. But these here? These are the special ones.
text_simple: ive laid waste to nations but these here these are the special ones

name: skel_arc_graveyard_04
text: After lifetimes of gratuitous slaughter, it's nice to bring new meaning to things.
text_simple: after lifetimes of gratuitous slaughter its nice to bring new meaning to things

name: skel_arc_graveyard_05
text: Nothing brightens up the aeons like a good game of Collect the Corpse.
text_simple: nothing brightens up the aeons like a good game of collect the corpse

name: skel_arc_graveyard_06
text: Who are we going to kill today?
text_simple: who are we going to kill today
criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsGameStart|Taunt Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsArcThrone

name: skel_arc_graveyard_07
text: Slaughter is just one letter away from slaughterS. So lets not limit our imaginations to one at a time.
text_simple: slaughter is just one letter away from slaughters so lets not limit our imaginations to one at a time

name: skel_arc_graveyard_08
text: It's the little things that make a life: Hearth, an Empire of Bone, and collecting the corpses of noteworthy opponents.
text_simple: its the little things that make a life hearth an empire of bone and collecting the corpses of noteworthy opponents

name: skel_arc_graveyard_09
text: The smart ones consider it an honor to be added to my collection. But most still put up a fight.
text_simple: the smart ones consider it an honor to be added to my collection but most still put up a fight

name: skel_arc_graveyard_10
text: Different bones for different reasons. Do I need these bones specifically? ...We'll say yes.
text_simple: different bones for different reasons do i need these bones specifically well say yes

name: skel_arc_graveyard_11
text: There's a fine line between a collection and a compulsion.
text_simple: theres a fine line between a collection and a compulsion

name: skel_arc_graveyard_13
text: It was kind of you to grow that skeleton to maturity for me.
text_simple: it was kind of you to grow that skeleton to maturity for me

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_01
text: The Empire of Bone knows no bounds. Nor should it.
text_simple: the empire of bone knows no bounds nor should it

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_03
text: What the king wants the king gets.
text_simple: what the king wants the king gets

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_04
text: It's good to be the king.
text_simple: its good to be the king
criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelDebutSpawn|Kill Isskeleton_king IsWKskel
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Killing a hero

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_06
text: An empire of bones is built atop rivers of blood.
text_simple: an empire of bones is built atop rivers of blood

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_07
text: You can't build an empire without breaking a few bones.
text_simple: you cant build an empire without breaking a few bones

name: skel_arc_graveyard_complete_08
text: If it has bones, I've killed it. Hell, if it doesn't have bones, I've probably killed it.
text_simple: if it has bones ive killed it hell if it doesnt have bones ive probably killed it

name: skel_arc_battlebegins_02
text: Comes now the King of Bones!
text_simple: comes now the king of bones
criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsGameStart|Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn
pretty_criteria: As the game starts|Spawning in the loadout

name: skel_arc_battlebegins_03
text: You haven't known war until you've warred with me!
text_simple: you havent known war until youve warred with me

name: skel_arc_battlebegins_04
text: I won't go easy on you. The weak and stupid die where they stand.
text_simple: i wont go easy on you the weak and stupid die where they stand

name: skel_arc_battlebegins_05
text: I'LL HELP MY WEAK AND PUNY ALLIES WHERE I CAN.
text_simple: ill help my weak and puny allies where i can

name: skel_arc_firstblood_01
text: First Blood! I've still got it!
text_simple: first blood ive still got it

name: skel_arc_firstblood_02
text: It is only right that First Blood should go to your king!
text_simple: it is only right that first blood should go to your king

name: skel_arc_firstblood_03
text: First Blood! Now to the business of the day!
text_simple: first blood now to the business of the day

name: skel_arc_firstblood_04
text: First Blood! The bone harvest begins.
text_simple: first blood the bone harvest begins

name: skel_arc_taunt_01
text: If you were going to live, this would make a great story for you.
text_simple: if you were going to live this would make a great story for you

name: skel_arc_taunt_02
text: I envy your tears. Though I would never have need to shed them.
text_simple: i envy your tears though i would never have need to shed them

name: skel_arc_move_07
text: Your king moves of his own accord.
text_simple: your king moves of his own accord

text: Who dares look upon my face?
text_simple: who dares look upon my face

name: skel_arc_attack_06
text: Submit to the Bone King's rule!
text_simple: submit to the bone kings rule

name: skel_arc_attack_19
text: Submit to the Empire of Bone.
text_simple: submit to the empire of bone

text: You can't kill a king who's dead!
text_simple: you cant kill a king whos dead

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_05
text: Your once and future king is crowned!
text_simple: your once and future king is crowned

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_08
text: I could do this all day.
text_simple: i could do this all day

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_09
text: Tis the next reign of Skeleton King!
text_simple: tis the next reign of skeleton king

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_11
text: Not even death can kill me.
text_simple: not even death can kill me
criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskelLoadoutSpawn|Death Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsReincarnating
pretty_criteria: Spawning in the loadout|Dying and respawning from aegis

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_13
text: Death has no grip on me!
text_simple: death has no grip on me

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn1_14
text: Bone is strongest where it's mended.
text_simple: bone is strongest where its mended

text: Uh, let's call it a draw!

text: All right... Time for plan B.

pretty_criteria: Dying and respawning from aegis IsNoFriendliesNearby IsEnoughEnemiesNearby

name: skel_arc_ability_incarn2_08
text: Is it too late for terms?
text_simple: is it too late for terms
criteria: Death Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsReincarnating IsNoFriendliesNearby IsEnoughEnemiesNearby
pretty_criteria: Dying and respawning from aegis IsNoFriendliesNearby IsEnoughEnemiesNearby

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_08
text: A wise king always has an army in the wings.
text_simple: a wise king always has an army in the wings

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_09
text: What, don't you roll with a crew?
text_simple: what dont you roll with a crew

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_10
text: A king and his court should never part.
text_simple: a king and his court should never part

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_11
text: A good toadie's worth his weight in bone.
text_simple: a good toadies worth his weight in bone

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_12
text: I knew they were lying around here somewhere.
text_simple: i knew they were lying around here somewhere

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_13
text: I could have sworn there were more...
text_simple: i could have sworn there were more

criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsMortalStrike IsCrewSmall Chance_50%

name: skel_arc_ability_mortalstrike_15
text: Three of you? Grrr. It'll do...
text_simple: three of you grrr itll do

text: Hmm. I guess I haven't been killing enough.

text: Kill the living and smash the stone!

text: I had a lot of fun collecting this lot.

criteria: Custom Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsMortalStrike IsCrewLarge Chance_50%

name: skel_arc_level_06
text: Soon perhaps I'll choose a queen.
text_simple: soon perhaps ill choose a queen

name: skel_arc_level_08
text: Now, this is truly the game of kings.
text_simple: now this is truly the game of kings

name: skel_arc_level_09
text: I'm your once and future thing.
text_simple: im your once and future thing

name: skel_arc_level_13
text: Servants! Bring me more of that.
text_simple: servants bring me more of that

name: skel_arc_level_15
text: One step closer to world domination.
text_simple: one step closer to world domination

name: skel_arc_level_16
text: My plans haven't changed. Only the means to carry them out.
text_simple: my plans havent changed only the means to carry them out

name: skel_arc_level_17
text: And my father said I'd never amount to anything. Who's laughing now dad?
text_simple: and my father said id never amount to anything whos laughing now dad

name: skel_arc_level_19
text: Ohh! Ho ho ho ha ha!
text_simple: ohh ho ho ho ha ha

name: skel_arc_level_22
text: Hm hm hm ha ha ha haaa.
text_simple: hm hm hm ha ha ha haaa

name: skel_arc_kill_01
text: Another subject for the Bone King!
text_simple: another subject for the bone king

name: skel_arc_kill_02
text: You come to a bad end.
text_simple: you come to a bad end

name: skel_arc_kill_03
text: I merely release the servant within!
text_simple: i merely release the servant within

name: skel_arc_kill_04
text: Your flesh falls, your bones belong to me.
text_simple: your flesh falls your bones belong to me

name: skel_arc_kill_05
text: Prostrate yourself! Oh good, you did.
text_simple: prostrate yourself oh good you did

name: skel_arc_kill_06
text: Very well, I accept your surrender.
text_simple: very well i accept your surrender

name: skel_arc_kill_08
text: I'll take that as a compliment.
text_simple: ill take that as a compliment

name: skel_arc_kill_09
text: Was that some sort of misguided tribute?
text_simple: was that some sort of misguided tribute

name: skel_arc_kill_10
text: Don't question it. Just let it roll over you.
text_simple: dont question it just let it roll over you

name: skel_arc_kill_14
text: Nipped that coup in the bud.
text_simple: nipped that coup in the bud

name: skel_arc_kill_16
text: Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha hah!
text_simple: ah ha ha ha ha ha ha hah

name: skel_arc_kill_17
text: Lord have mercy? I think not.
text_simple: lord have mercy i think not

name: skel_arc_kill_18
text: It's a pity surrender wasn't an option.
text_simple: its a pity surrender wasnt an option

name: skel_arc_kill_22
text: Hoo hoo hoo ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: hoo hoo hoo ha ha ha ha

name: skel_arc_kill_23
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: skel_arc_kill_25
text: I see you take my sword point exactly!
text_simple: i see you take my sword point exactly

name: skel_arc_kill_26
text: IT'S THE EXPRESSION ON THEIR LITTLE FACES I LIKE.
text_simple: its the expression on their little faces i like

name: skel_arc_kill_27
text: I TAKE YOUR LIFE AS IT COMES. MOSTLY WITHOUT NOTE.
text_simple: i take your life as it comes mostly without note

name: skel_arc_death_04
text: Dig my grave and I'll put you in it.
text_simple: dig my grave and ill put you in it

name: skel_arc_death_06
text: I should have chosen a queen!
text_simple: i should have chosen a queen

name: skel_arc_death_07
text: Who will lead my kingdom now?
text_simple: who will lead my kingdom now

name: skel_arc_death_11
text: So this is how it ends?
text_simple: so this is how it ends

name: skel_arc_death_12
text: The age of kings has ended.
text_simple: the age of kings has ended

name: skel_arc_death_15
text: Death has no grip on me.
text_simple: death has no grip on me

name: skel_arc_death_16
text: Now it's someone else's turn to die.
text_simple: now its someone elses turn to die

name: skel_arc_death_21
text: Hnn hnn hnn hnn ahh hahh hah. Ahh ha ha ha haa!
text_simple: hnn hnn hnn hnn ahh hahh hah ahh ha ha ha haa

name: skel_arc_death_41
text: See you sooner than you think!
text_simple: see you sooner than you think

name: skel_arc_death_42
text: The grave won't long hold me!
text_simple: the grave wont long hold me

name: skel_arc_death_45
text: Don't carve my headstone just yet.
text_simple: dont carve my headstone just yet

name: skel_arc_death_54
text: By my bones, I swear revenge!
text_simple: by my bones i swear revenge

name: skel_arc_death_55
text: Many the day I shall rest in clay!
text_simple: many the day i shall rest in clay

name: skel_arc_death_56
text: This bone shall stick in your throat!
text_simple: this bone shall stick in your throat

name: skel_arc_death_57
text: Grind me to powder, even then I shall return!
text_simple: grind me to powder even then i shall return

name: skel_arc_death_61
text: Aegis? Aegis?! I don't need no stinkin' Aegis!
text_simple: aegis aegis i dont need no stinkin aegis

name: skel_arc_death_long_05
text: Good thing I already lost my skin.
text_simple: good thing i already lost my skin

name: skel_arc_death_long_06
text: That was my last raw nerve!
text_simple: that was my last raw nerve

name: skel_arc_death_long_16
text: What sort of king am I?
text_simple: what sort of king am i

name: skel_arc_death_long_17
text: I'll be right back. Wait? What?
text_simple: ill be right back wait what

name: skel_arc_death_long_18
text: Would it not please you to cut me down?
text_simple: would it not please you to cut me down

name: skel_arc_respawn_01
text: Once is a bit of fun. Twice makes it personal.
text_simple: once is a bit of fun twice makes it personal

name: skel_arc_respawn_02
text: All right. Enough with the bone jokes.
text_simple: all right enough with the bone jokes

name: skel_arc_respawn_05
text: My subjects will be glad to hear my voice.
text_simple: my subjects will be glad to hear my voice

name: skel_arc_respawn_06
text: I have dreamed of this day.
text_simple: i have dreamed of this day

name: skel_arc_respawn_07
text: What is a kingdom without a king? Just dom.
text_simple: what is a kingdom without a king just dom

name: skel_arc_respawn_08
text: I'll not be so easily dispatched.
text_simple: ill not be so easily dispatched

name: skel_arc_respawn_10
text: Issue a proclamation. The Bone King's throne is occupied.
text_simple: issue a proclamation the bone kings throne is occupied

name: skel_arc_respawn_11
text: The kingdom's gone to hell while I was away.
text_simple: the kingdoms gone to hell while i was away

name: skel_arc_respawn_13
text: I'm unfettered by the needs of the flesh.
text_simple: im unfettered by the needs of the flesh

name: skel_arc_respawn_15
text: I owe many days to the grave.
text_simple: i owe many days to the grave

name: skel_arc_respawn_17
text: Long live the king, which is to say: Me.
text_simple: long live the king which is to say me

name: skel_arc_respawn_18
text: Would you jump in my grave that fast?
text_simple: would you jump in my grave that fast

name: skel_arc_respawn_19
text: Any pretenders to my throne will be sorely disappointed.
text_simple: any pretenders to my throne will be sorely disappointed

name: skel_arc_respawn_20
text: I've had a lovely tour of the boneyard.
text_simple: ive had a lovely tour of the boneyard

name: skel_arc_respawn_21
text: The King of Bones reigns again.
text_simple: the king of bones reigns again

name: skel_arc_lasthit_04
criteria: LastHit Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Powerup Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsPowerupBounty

name: skel_arc_lasthit_09
text: I'll make thralls of you all.
text_simple: ill make thralls of you all

name: skel_arc_lasthit_14
text: Did I give you permission to fall?
text_simple: did i give you permission to fall

name: skel_arc_deny_10
text: In the name of the king.
text_simple: in the name of the king

name: skel_arc_deny_12
criteria: Deny Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Powerup Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsPowerupBounty

name: skel_arc_deny_17
text: A good king makes hard decisions.
text_simple: a good king makes hard decisions

name: skel_arc_purch_02
text: I'd empty every treasury for this. Even my own.
text_simple: id empty every treasury for this even my own

name: skel_arc_scepter_02
text: What's a king without his scepter?
text_simple: whats a king without his scepter

name: skel_arc_blink_02
text: Blink Dagger! Heh heh. Surprise, your King is here!
text_simple: blink dagger heh heh surprise your king is here

name: skel_arc_items_16
text: It's the three R's--Refresher, Rapier, and whatever the hell I want!
text_simple: its the three rsrefresher rapier and whatever the hell i want
criteria: Purchase Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsDivineRapier IsWraithBalling Chance_10%

name: skel_arc_items_17
text: It's the three R's--Refresher, Rapier, and you will show me RESPECT.
text_simple: its the three rsrefresher rapier and you will show me respect
criteria: Purchase Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsDivineRapier IsWraithBalling Chance_10%

name: skel_arc_items_18
text: Oh, Rapier. NOW YOUR KING IS BALLING OUT OF CONTROL!
text_simple: oh rapier now your king is balling out of control
criteria: Purchase Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsDivineRapier IsWraithBalling Chance_5%

name: skel_arc_immort_02
text: As if I needed more of this. But I'll take it.
text_simple: as if i needed more of this but ill take it

name: skel_arc_doubdam_02
text: Crown me twice, shame on you!
text_simple: crown me twice shame on you
pretty_criteria: Activating a double damage rune (25% chance)

name: skel_arc_regen_02
text: I usually have people for this.
text_simple: i usually have people for this

name: skel_arc_arcane_01
text: An arcane trick. But I like it.
text_simple: an arcane trick but i like it

name: skel_arc_arcane_02
text: Now I have all the spells.
text_simple: now i have all the spells

name: skel_arc_bounty_02
text: Technically, these all belong to me.
text_simple: technically these all belong to me

name: skel_arc_outpost_capture_01
text: Who gave you permission to build this here?
text_simple: who gave you permission to build this here

name: skel_arc_outpost_capture_02
text: I claim this outpost for the Empire of Bone.
text_simple: i claim this outpost for the empire of bone

name: skel_arc_outpost_capture_03
text: I claim this outpost in the name of ME.
text_simple: i claim this outpost in the name of me

name: skel_arc_thanks_01
text: You have done the kingdom a service.
text_simple: you have done the kingdom a service

name: skel_arc_underattack_02
text: Curs! Your king is under attack!
text_simple: curs your king is under attack

name: skel_arc_inthebag_01
text: It's as certain as my choice of heir, this one is in the bag.
text_simple: its as certain as my choice of heir this one is in the bag

name: skel_arc_inthebag_02
text: This one is in the bag. And not one of those drab bags the lot of you are using. A ROYAL bag well beyond your petty means.
text_simple: this one is in the bag and not one of those drab bags the lot of you are using a royal bag well beyond your petty means

name: skel_arc_item_common_01
text: I believe I have a storeroom full of these.
text_simple: i believe i have a storeroom full of these

name: skel_arc_item_moderate_01
text: You can buy a lot of allies with one of these.
text_simple: you can buy a lot of allies with one of these

name: skel_arc_item_rare_01
text: This will be a jewel in my already sparkling crown.
text_simple: this will be a jewel in my already sparkling crown
pretty_criteria: Recieving an ultra rare cosmetic item

name: skel_arc_lose_03
text: Has any king ever had a shorter reign?
text_simple: has any king ever had a shorter reign

name: skel_arc_lose_05
text: What do you mean it isn't two out of three?
text_simple: what do you mean it isnt two out of three

name: skel_arc_lose_06
text: This isn't over until I say it is!
text_simple: this isnt over until i say it is

name: skel_arc_win_03
text: Welcome to all my new subjects. Now let's get to know each other.
text_simple: welcome to all my new subjects now lets get to know each other

name: skel_arc_win_04
text: Oh how the skeletons shall dance!
text_simple: oh how the skeletons shall dance

name: skel_arc_win_05_02
text: I think I'll rebuild this Ancient in bone.
text_simple: i think ill rebuild this ancient in bone

name: skel_arc_win_06
text: Ok that's over. Where are we fighting next?
text_simple: ok thats over where are we fighting next

criteria: Kill Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Emote Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsEmoteLaugh

criteria: Kill Isskeleton_king IsWKskel|Emote Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsEmoteLaugh

text: Oh ho uh huh uh haha haha hahaha!

name: skel_arc_ally_lvo_01
text: I regret that I can no longer feel the true depths of pain.
text_simple: i regret that i can no longer feel the true depths of pain
pretty_criteria: Queen of Pain is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: skel_arc_ally_lvo_02
text: I welcome the Spirit of Earth, though I'll not be buried in it.
text_simple: i welcome the spirit of earth though ill not be buried in it
pretty_criteria: Earth Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: skel_arc_ally_lvo_03
text: Ah, Phoenix, one who knows what it's like to fall and rise again.
text_simple: ah phoenix one who knows what its like to fall and rise again
pretty_criteria: Phoenix is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: skel_arc_ally_lvo_04
text: Oracle, you must have foreseen that your future lies with me.
text_simple: oracle you must have foreseen that your future lies with me
pretty_criteria: Oracle is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: skel_arc_ally_lvo_05
text: I dub thee Chaos Knight! How's that for a name? Not bad, eh?
text_simple: i dub thee chaos knight hows that for a name not bad eh
pretty_criteria: Chaos Knight is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_01
text: What sort of king was that?
text_simple: what sort of king was that

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_03
text: Oh Queen of Pain, I still can't feel your touch.
text_simple: oh queen of pain i still cant feel your touch

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_04
text: I would that you had joined me as my queen.
text_simple: i would that you had joined me as my queen

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_05
text: Undying, they called you. That's a laugh.
text_simple: undying they called you thats a laugh

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_06
text: You'll make a better subject than anything in your book.
text_simple: youll make a better subject than anything in your book

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_07
text: You dared raise a hand or whatever that is against your king?
text_simple: you dared raise a hand or whatever that is against your king

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_08
text: Your spirits have abandoned you in the kingdom of the damned.
text_simple: your spirits have abandoned you in the kingdom of the damned

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_09
text: Your shades guided you to my kingdom. Perhaps they weren't your allies after all.
text_simple: your shades guided you to my kingdom perhaps they werent your allies after all

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_11
text: From ashes reborn. I know the feeling.
text_simple: from ashes reborn i know the feeling

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_12
text: Sorry, Doom, I was a great admirer of your work.
text_simple: sorry doom i was a great admirer of your work

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_13
text: Underlord. Your title is worthless here.
text_simple: underlord your title is worthless here

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_14
text: Go back and guard your arcs.
text_simple: go back and guard your arcs

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_15
text: And you call yourself a lord.
text_simple: and you call yourself a lord

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_16
text: Lord of what land were you again?
text_simple: lord of what land were you again

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_17
text: Was that some sort of lord?
text_simple: was that some sort of lord

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_18
text: Funny, I don't remember knighting that one.
text_simple: funny i dont remember knighting that one

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_19
text: You should know better than to oppose a king.
text_simple: you should know better than to oppose a king

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_20
text: Even titans must bent the knee.
text_simple: even titans must bent the knee

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_21
text: Court mage? More like court jester.
text_simple: court mage more like court jester

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_22
text: Your spirit was too lowly to stand before a king.
text_simple: your spirit was too lowly to stand before a king

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_23
text: No amount of foresight could have prepared you.
text_simple: no amount of foresight could have prepared you

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_24
text: You were a poor pretender to my throne.
text_simple: you were a poor pretender to my throne

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_25
text: You are here out of season, Winter Wyvern.
text_simple: you are here out of season winter wyvern

name: skel_arc_rival_lvo_26
text: I could not tolerate such an explosive presence in my kingdom.
text_simple: i could not tolerate such an explosive presence in my kingdom

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_02
text: I have no use for an exoskeleton!
text_simple: i have no use for an exoskeleton
criteria: Kill Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsEnemyWeaver Chance_25%|Kill Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsEnemyNyx_Assassin Chance_25%
pretty_criteria: Killing Weaver (25% chance)|Killing Nyx Assassin (25% chance)

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_04
text: What lacks a skeleton also lacks a soul!
text_simple: what lacks a skeleton also lacks a soul

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_05
text: A small pile of bones you'll make!
text_simple: a small pile of bones youll make

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_06
text: A more repugnant skeleton I've never seen!
text_simple: a more repugnant skeleton ive never seen

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_08
text: What's this, Sand King, no bones?
text_simple: whats this sand king no bones

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_09
text: Clinkz...still playing at bow'n arrows, I see.
text_simple: clinkz still playing at bown arrows i see

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_13
text: Don't expect me to sing your dirge.
text_simple: dont expect me to sing your dirge

name: skel_arc_kill_lvo_15
text: Dirge's death plays sweetly in my ears.
text_simple: dirges death plays sweetly in my ears

name: skel_arc_rival_01
text: I had a steed like this once. It's good to be reunited.
text_simple: i had a steed like this once its good to be reunited

name: skel_arc_rival_02
text: I don't want your mist. Just the brittle innards.
text_simple: i dont want your mist just the brittle innards

name: skel_arc_rival_03
text: Two bags of bones? A nice bit of fortune.
text_simple: two bags of bones a nice bit of fortune

name: skel_arc_rival_04
text: Even two of you combined hardly stack up.
text_simple: even two of you combined hardly stack up

name: skel_arc_rival_05
text: Leave me to my mission, Apparition. You're a waste of time.
text_simple: leave me to my mission apparition youre a waste of time

name: skel_arc_rival_06
text: Little more than a distraction, in the end.
text_simple: little more than a distraction in the end

name: skel_arc_rival_07
text: Your bones would be wasted on the Dead God.
text_simple: your bones would be wasted on the dead god

name: skel_arc_rival_08
text: No bones blink from MY grasp, Anti-Mage.
text_simple: no bones blink from my grasp antimage

name: skel_arc_rival_09
text: Time to crack that thing open and find out what you're really about.
text_simple: time to crack that thing open and find out what youre really about

name: skel_arc_rival_10
text: The ancients are just another footnote in my story. I don't care what you think your role is.
text_simple: the ancients are just another footnote in my story i dont care what you think your role is

name: skel_arc_rival_11
text: I always enjoyed your brutal simplicity, Axe. Until it got in my way.
text_simple: i always enjoyed your brutal simplicity axe until it got in my way

name: skel_arc_rival_12
text: Let me tell you a little story about nightmares, Bane.
text_simple: let me tell you a little story about nightmares bane

name: skel_arc_rival_13
text: What I really wanted was the bat, but I won't say no to the rider too.
text_simple: what i really wanted was the bat but i wont say no to the rider too

name: skel_arc_rival_14
text: Let that be a lesson to ALL who refuse my offers of employment.
text_simple: let that be a lesson to all who refuse my offers of employment

name: skel_arc_rival_15
text: The Flayed Twins could be on to something... Maybe I should get a bone seeker.
text_simple: the flayed twins could be on to something maybe i should get a bone seeker

name: skel_arc_rival_16
text: You didn't need to track me. The King doesn't hide.
text_simple: you didnt need to track me the king doesnt hide

name: skel_arc_rival_17
text: I really wanted to like you, too.
text_simple: i really wanted to like you too

name: skel_arc_rival_18
text: The feast will go on without you -- in my honor.
text_simple: the feast will go on without you in my honor

name: skel_arc_rival_19
text: A dangerous carcass like that must hide rare bones indeed.
text_simple: a dangerous carcass like that must hide rare bones indeed

name: skel_arc_rival_20
text: I've got no use for arachnids!
text_simple: ive got no use for arachnids

name: skel_arc_rival_21
text: We'll have leg bones for days!
text_simple: well have leg bones for days

name: skel_arc_rival_22
text: If only the phantoms remained corporeal too...
text_simple: if only the phantoms remained corporeal too

name: skel_arc_rival_23
text: Chen, I thought so little of you I'm not even going to offer any parting words.
text_simple: chen i thought so little of you im not even going to offer any parting words

name: skel_arc_rival_24
text: Born followers get no respect from the likes of me!
text_simple: born followers get no respect from the likes of me

name: skel_arc_rival_25
text: Here lies a mortal who truly knew the meaning of duty.
text_simple: here lies a mortal who truly knew the meaning of duty

name: skel_arc_rival_26
text: Let's test this immortality of yours a bit further.
text_simple: lets test this immortality of yours a bit further

name: skel_arc_rival_27
text: Why, there's bone underneath there after all.
text_simple: why theres bone underneath there after all

name: skel_arc_rival_28
text: Damn you! I hate it when they shatter!
text_simple: damn you i hate it when they shatter

name: skel_arc_rival_29_02
text: I know the perfect place for this one.
text_simple: i know the perfect place for this one

name: skel_arc_rival_30
text: Such vitality is wasted on the young.
text_simple: such vitality is wasted on the young

name: skel_arc_rival_31
text: I have no need of your sorcery, you Nothl weirdo.
text_simple: i have no need of your sorcery you nothl weirdo

name: skel_arc_rival_32
text: You see, prophet? I know aaalll about death.
text_simple: you see prophet i know aaalll about death

name: skel_arc_rival_35
text: Dragons are still below Skeleton Kings on the bad ass hierarchy.
text_simple: dragons are still below skeleton kings on the bad ass hierarchy

name: skel_arc_rival_36
text: Why do they let these hideous creatures procreate?
text_simple: why do they let these hideous creatures procreate

name: skel_arc_rival_37
text: Pretty fancy moves for a talking statue.
text_simple: pretty fancy moves for a talking statue

name: skel_arc_rival_38
text: Time to fit you for a totem of bone.
text_simple: time to fit you for a totem of bone

name: skel_arc_rival_39
text: I thought you'd hit harder than that, Titan.
text_simple: i thought youd hit harder than that titan

name: skel_arc_rival_40
text: I need not fear flames, Spirit.
text_simple: i need not fear flames spirit

name: skel_arc_rival_41
text: I thought to wait for more little creatures to arrive, but I became impatient.
text_simple: i thought to wait for more little creatures to arrive but i became impatient

name: skel_arc_rival_42
text: I do not waste words on amorphous blobs.
text_simple: i do not waste words on amorphous blobs

name: skel_arc_rival_43
text: In the land of the blind... I'M still king.
text_simple: in the land of the blind im still king

name: skel_arc_rival_44
text: Count yourself fortunate I didn't do worse with the brush.
text_simple: count yourself fortunate i didnt do worse with the brush

name: skel_arc_rival_45
text: You were past your years anyway, old man. Best to get you before your bones go completely brittle.
text_simple: you were past your years anyway old man best to get you before your bones go completely brittle

name: skel_arc_rival_46
text: Killing the crazy ones isn't as fun because they don't even care if they lose.
text_simple: killing the crazy ones isnt as fun because they dont even care if they lose

name: skel_arc_rival_47
text: I have no words for disembodied balls of light!
text_simple: i have no words for disembodied balls of light

name: skel_arc_rival_48
text: Trust me, Invoker. Everyone knew you had this coming.
text_simple: trust me invoker everyone knew you had this coming

name: skel_arc_rival_49
text: You remind me of the advisors I like to kill.
text_simple: you remind me of the advisors i like to kill

name: skel_arc_rival_50
text: This rare a specimen calls for celebration! Bring me a peasant to kill.
text_simple: this rare a specimen calls for celebration bring me a peasant to kill

name: skel_arc_rival_51
text: I always enjoy killing the last of one's kind.
text_simple: i always enjoy killing the last of ones kind

name: skel_arc_rival_52
text: Helpless old man. I guess your looks weren't deceiving.
text_simple: helpless old man i guess your looks werent deceiving
pretty_criteria: Killing Keeper of the Light (25% chance)

name: skel_arc_rival_53
text: Time to answer this question once and for all, Kunkka.
text_simple: time to answer this question once and for all kunkka

name: skel_arc_rival_54
text: Bring on your legions, Tresdin. I welcome more vassals.
text_simple: bring on your legions tresdin i welcome more vassals

name: skel_arc_rival_55
text: You'll make a nice wall mount for my summer home.
text_simple: youll make a nice wall mount for my summer home

name: skel_arc_rival_56
text: I generally prefer to remove a victim's flesh myself, but I'll find ways to divert my disappointment.
text_simple: i generally prefer to remove a victims flesh myself but ill find ways to divert my disappointment

name: skel_arc_rival_57
text: Your gaolers mustn't have been very skilled.
text_simple: your gaolers mustnt have been very skilled

name: skel_arc_rival_58
text: Nothing left but ashes. What a waste.
text_simple: nothing left but ashes what a waste

name: skel_arc_rival_59
text: I'm long past need for your services, demon witch.
text_simple: im long past need for your services demon witch

name: skel_arc_rival_60
text: The bear isn't real? But that was the part I wanted!
text_simple: the bear isnt real but that was the part i wanted

name: skel_arc_rival_61
text: You weren't worthy of such a fine animal.
text_simple: you werent worthy of such a fine animal

name: skel_arc_rival_62
text: Don't worry, Nova. I'll fix you. I fix everything.
text_simple: dont worry nova ill fix you i fix everything

name: skel_arc_rival_63
text: It was thoughtful of you to bring the wolves too.
text_simple: it was thoughtful of you to bring the wolves too

name: skel_arc_rival_64
text: I told you there's no marrow!
text_simple: i told you theres no marrow

name: skel_arc_rival_66
text: Talking beasts coming out of the woodwork...
text_simple: talking beasts coming out of the woodwork

name: skel_arc_rival_67
text: Haha, if you were the god of war, I guess that likens me to the god of death.
text_simple: haha if you were the god of war i guess that likens me to the god of death

name: skel_arc_rival_68
text: Your magic is far less effective on bone!
text_simple: your magic is far less effective on bone

name: skel_arc_rival_69
text: I guess I have to clean up the riff raff myself!
text_simple: i guess i have to clean up the riff raff myself

name: skel_arc_rival_70
text: I generally dislike killing felines, but the rider died quite well.
text_simple: i generally dislike killing felines but the rider died quite well

name: skel_arc_rival_71
text: Don't worry, Sagan. I can bring you back to life...ish.
text_simple: dont worry sagan i can bring you back to life ish

name: skel_arc_rival_72
text: I've been waiting to shut your mouth for a long time, Wu Kong.
text_simple: ive been waiting to shut your mouth for a long time wu kong

name: skel_arc_rival_73
text: Gods can't kill you, but I'm not a god. Hail to the real king.
text_simple: gods cant kill you but im not a god hail to the real king

name: skel_arc_rival_75
text: Get this water puddle out of my way.
text_simple: get this water puddle out of my way

name: skel_arc_rival_76
text: I see you more as an instrument type.
text_simple: i see you more as an instrument type

name: skel_arc_rival_77
text: I love a nice set of antlers. Really ties a room together.
text_simple: i love a nice set of antlers really ties a room together

name: skel_arc_rival_78
text: Your plague works no wonders on me.
text_simple: your plague works no wonders on me

name: skel_arc_rival_79
text: Fear of the dark is basic. Wouldn't you say?
text_simple: fear of the dark is basic wouldnt you say

name: skel_arc_rival_80
text: I could have used an assassin who only knows one word. Pity. ... I'm assuming nyx means kill?
text_simple: i could have used an assassin who only knows one word pity im assuming nyx means kill

name: skel_arc_rival_81
text: The others don't see it, but your bone value is off the charts.
text_simple: the others dont see it but your bone value is off the charts

name: skel_arc_rival_82
text: I love to watch for that moment when belief leaves the eyes.
text_simple: i love to watch for that moment when belief leaves the eyes

name: skel_arc_rival_84
text: Which quip am I going to drop over your corpse, Oracle?
text_simple: which quip am i going to drop over your corpse oracle
criteria: EnemyNear Isskeleton_king IsWKskel IsEnemyOracle EarlyMidGame Chance_25%
pretty_criteria: EnemyNear Oracle at between 1 minute and 20 minutes in (25% chance)

name: skel_arc_rival_85
text: A forgettable death. Perhaps that's why you could not avoid it.
text_simple: a forgettable death perhaps thats why you could not avoid it

name: skel_arc_rival_86
text: Well, killing me obviously wasn't your purpose.
text_simple: well killing me obviously wasnt your purpose

name: skel_arc_rival_87
text: You fight for justice, pangolier? THERE?S NO JUSTICE, THERE?S JUST ME.
text_simple: you fight for justice pangolier theres no justice theres just me

name: skel_arc_rival_88
text: Your kind follows too many rules for my liking, assassin. You only need one rule: my rule.
text_simple: your kind follows too many rules for my liking assassin you only need one rule my rule

name: skel_arc_rival_89
text: I bet you thought things were going to get pretty funny. I don't like funny!
text_simple: i bet you thought things were going to get pretty funny i dont like funny

name: skel_arc_rival_90
text: I was going to give you the benefit of the doubt on account of the whiskers. But safer just to kill you.
text_simple: i was going to give you the benefit of the doubt on account of the whiskers but safer just to kill you

name: skel_arc_rival_91
text: I think it's best if I remain the resurrection expert around here.
text_simple: i think its best if i remain the resurrection expert around here

name: skel_arc_rival_92
text: I hate faerie dragons more than real dragons!
text_simple: i hate faerie dragons more than real dragons

name: skel_arc_rival_93
text: Well at least the flesh'll fall right off the bone.
text_simple: well at least the fleshll fall right off the bone

name: skel_arc_rival_94
text: I heard they need a xylophone player in hell.
text_simple: i heard they need a xylophone player in hell

name: skel_arc_rival_95
text: I bear no more fears of the flesh, Akasha.
text_simple: i bear no more fears of the flesh akasha

name: skel_arc_rival_96
text: There's no place for the likes of you in my collection.
text_simple: theres no place for the likes of you in my collection

name: skel_arc_rival_97
text: As I suspected, the bones appear just fine.
text_simple: as i suspected the bones appear just fine

name: skel_arc_rival_98
text: Not even you can unravel my best tricks, magus.
text_simple: not even you can unravel my best tricks magus

name: skel_arc_rival_101
text: I've advanced beyond umbral concerns, Shadow Demon.
text_simple: ive advanced beyond umbral concerns shadow demon

name: skel_arc_rival_102
text: The punishment for molesting my soul is extreme indeed.
text_simple: the punishment for molesting my soul is extreme indeed

name: skel_arc_rival_103
text: We have laws against street performers where I'm from. OFF WITH HIS HEAD.
text_simple: we have laws against street performers where im from off with his head

name: skel_arc_rival_104
text: I WILL NOT BE SILENT. I WILL BE THE OPPOSITE OF SILENT AND YOU'LL BE DEAD.
text_simple: i will not be silent i will be the opposite of silent and youll be dead

name: skel_arc_rival_105
text: The good news is that your petty problems won't follow you in death.
text_simple: the good news is that your petty problems wont follow you in death

name: skel_arc_rival_106
text: I think I'll carve your spine into a whistle, Slardar.
text_simple: i think ill carve your spine into a whistle slardar

name: skel_arc_rival_107
text: I hired you for one simple job. What do I care if they threw you in prison?
text_simple: i hired you for one simple job what do i care if they threw you in prison

name: skel_arc_rival_108
text: GODS ABOVE AND DEMONS BELOW, DO YOU EVER SHUT UP WOMAN?
text_simple: gods above and demons below do you ever shut up woman

name: skel_arc_rival_109
text: The lizard had its charms, but even the best keen are hardly tolerable.
text_simple: the lizard had its charms but even the best keen are hardly tolerable

name: skel_arc_rival_110
text: I think I stepped on something.
text_simple: i think i stepped on something

name: skel_arc_rival_111
text: I don't get you transdimensional types. It seems like this fate was easily avoided.
text_simple: i dont get you transdimensional types it seems like this fate was easily avoided

name: skel_arc_rival_112
text: Tell your master our contract is void. He didn't hold up his end of the bargain.
text_simple: tell your master our contract is void he didnt hold up his end of the bargain

name: skel_arc_rival_113
text: I have no use for electricity. I want BONE. I already have POWER.
text_simple: i have no use for electricity i want bone i already have power

name: skel_arc_rival_114
text: The intermingled creatures always have the most interesting physiology.
text_simple: the intermingled creatures always have the most interesting physiology

name: skel_arc_rival_115
text: Three for the price of one! Sometimes life's too easy.
text_simple: three for the price of one sometimes lifes too easy

name: skel_arc_rival_116
text: Blast my bones, that was annoying!
text_simple: blast my bones that was annoying

name: skel_arc_rival_118
text: Tell your master I want my sundial back.
text_simple: tell your master i want my sundial back

name: skel_arc_rival_119
text: Nothing I hate more than a demon with ambiguous goals.
text_simple: nothing i hate more than a demon with ambiguous goals

name: skel_arc_rival_120
text: At last, the great Tidehunter. A scrimshander's delight!
text_simple: at last the great tidehunter a scrimshanders delight

name: skel_arc_rival_121
text: Tis fortunate I don't require his brain.
text_simple: tis fortunate i dont require his brain

name: skel_arc_rival_122
text: I know his type -- better off dead!
text_simple: i know his type better off dead

name: skel_arc_rival_123
text: Why'd you roll across my path, anyway, Tiny?
text_simple: whyd you roll across my path anyway tiny

name: skel_arc_rival_124
text: I told you I have NO INTEREST IN TREES. They can all be cut down AFTER the war is over.
text_simple: i told you i have no interest in trees they can all be cut down after the war is over

name: skel_arc_rival_125
text: Even as an unofficial title, warlord was pushing it.
text_simple: even as an unofficial title warlord was pushing it

name: skel_arc_rival_126
text: A chance to bone up on my scrimshaw!
text_simple: a chance to bone up on my scrimshaw

name: skel_arc_rival_127
text: All the collectors had their eyes on you.
text_simple: all the collectors had their eyes on you

name: skel_arc_rival_128
text: You should have bowed to your rightful king. Subservience is literally in your name.
text_simple: you should have bowed to your rightful king subservience is literally in your name

name: skel_arc_rival_129
text: Kids these days. EVERYTHING is hyperbole...
text_simple: kids these days everything is hyperbole

name: skel_arc_rival_131
text: You mentioned a den, Ursa. Where would I find that?
text_simple: you mentioned a den ursa where would i find that

name: skel_arc_rival_132
text: Taking back your own kingdom lacks imagination. I'll settle for nothing less than ALL the kingdoms.
text_simple: taking back your own kingdom lacks imagination ill settle for nothing less than all the kingdoms

name: skel_arc_rival_133
text: Do these things even have bones? I can never tell.
text_simple: do these things even have bones i can never tell

name: skel_arc_rival_134
text: All you did was give me a bit of polish, Viper.
text_simple: all you did was give me a bit of polish viper

name: skel_arc_rival_135
text: I told you I don't belong there!
text_simple: i told you i dont belong there

name: skel_arc_rival_136
text: No bones about it. You suck.
text_simple: no bones about it you suck

name: skel_arc_rival_139
text: I used to have need of men like you. But no longer. Obviously.
text_simple: i used to have need of men like you but no longer obviously

name: skel_arc_rival_140
text: Ugh. Is this the start of an infestation? We'll see about that.
text_simple: ugh is this the start of an infestation well see about that

name: skel_arc_rival_141
text: I half expected your corpse to just blow away.
text_simple: i half expected your corpse to just blow away

name: skel_arc_rival_142
text: We have very different opinions on the subject of art.
text_simple: we have very different opinions on the subject of art

name: skel_arc_rival_143
text: I'll never need a doctor again, thank you.
text_simple: ill never need a doctor again thank you

name: skel_arc_rival_144
text: Mortals have this phrase... god's bones. Let's unpack that a bit.
text_simple: mortals have this phrase gods bones lets unpack that a bit

name: skel_arc_rival_145
text: You should have stayed on your mountain, Zeus. My forces won't get THERE for ages.
text_simple: you should have stayed on your mountain zeus my forces wont get there for ages

name: skel_arc_rival_302
text: Inarticulate and savage. A fitting way for you to die.
text_simple: inarticulate and savage a fitting way for you to die

name: skel_arc_rival_304
text: Your tiny carcass was almost a waste of my time.
text_simple: your tiny carcass was almost a waste of my time

name: skel_arc_items_38
text: I don't need to bottle anything up. I'm the king!
text_simple: i dont need to bottle anything up im the king

name: skel_arc_items_80
text: No one can have these but me!
text_simple: no one can have these but me
